measured_by: two-alternative forced-choice animacy judgment task (choosing the more animate face)
justification: "Study 1a examined the effects of gaze manipulation on animacy perception. The participants viewed two facial images with artificial features and then chose the image perceived as more animate."

measured_by: two-alternative forced-choice preference judgment task (choosing the preferred face)
justification: "Study 1b was designed to replicate the effect of gaze manipulation on preference judgment ... it made participants choose their preferred facial images."

measured_by: two-alternative forced-choice roundness judgment task (choosing the rounder face)
justification: "Study 1c was designed to confirm the specificity of gaze manipulation ... it required participants to choose a rounder facial image."
